website_summaries.verdict: While it'll cost you a hefty $380, the Beats Studio Wireless is an excellent wireless Bluetooth headphone.
pros: The Beats Studio Wireless is a very comfortable over-the-ear wireless headphone that offers excellent sound for a Bluetooth headphone and features active noise-canceling technology
The headphones fold up into a more compact form factor and battery life is decent at 12 hours of wireless listening
They also worked well as a wireless headset for making cell-phone calls
cons: if the integrated rechargeable battery dies, the music dies

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with the mic. I attempted to perform a reset per the instructions provided on the Beats website with no luck. I contacted Beats technical support and we attempted to update them using the Beats updater and the updater wouldn't recognize the headphones. They attempted to walk me through the same steps for a reset with that same results. Since neither the updater or the reset worked the way that it should have, they determined that these headphones were fake. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: charles gerard tanpoco

customer_reviews.title: in perfect condition and everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They're just as I expected! in perfect condition and everything I wanted! They didn't come in an actual beat box but they were packaged as if they were new. I've used them every day since I bought them and couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Malek

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is superb, but the cushion inside has come undone after about two months.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound and beasts studio but the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: Product broke only after wearing it a few times I’ve never been so careful with a pare of headphones before and theyBROKE! Love the sound and beasts studio but the quality of the pair I received didn’t live up to the brand name
customer_reviews.author: Isaac faraci

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones did not work AT ALL. They were a gift for my son and he was so disappointed. Now he has to wait to send them back and get new ones.
customer_reviews.author: dewey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 years I believe and still like new
customer_reviews.author: Zakriya Noor

customer_reviews.title: Quality Refurb Seller...
customer_reviews.text: Good price, happy with my headphones...Look good, feel good, sound fine....No issues with anything to-date
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Alicks

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were fixed
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because they were refurbished, but out of package didn't work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect this to come packaged with the standard beats accessories. Regardless, the headsets work just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Afriyie

customer_reviews.title: Ear pieces riped!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple weeks, the foam ear piece started to rip at the seam. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: a.tobler

product_meta.title: Beats Studio Wireless On-Ear Headphone - Titanium (Refurbished)
product_meta.description: Make your music listening experience more personal and real with the Titanium Dr. Dre Studio Wireless Headphones from Beats. Introducing to the new studio lineup a Bluetooth enabled feature for true mobility. The headphones are featured with Beats Acoustic Engine DSP to reproduce your audio. The Studio Wireless headphones include a RemoteTalk cable with mic allowing you use the headphones with wired sources as well. On-ear cup controls helps you to take calls, skip music and adjust volume. With built-in Bluetooth wireless technology, these headphone enables wireless operation with up to a 30 feet. Beat's high quality studio headphones features dual-mode Adaptive Noise Canceling that makes sure you hear the music, not the unwanted sound around you. Further, the built-in rechargeable battery can provide up to 20 hours of wired operation or 12 hours of wireless. Enjoy the crystal clear sound quality by cutting off the outside noise without the hassle of tangled cords with the Wireless Over-Ear Titanium Headphones from Beats by Dre! PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS Feel your MusicThe Beats Acoustic Engine makes your listening experience personal and real. Our signature DSP software is designed to generate the emotional experience that some of the music industrys greatest rock, hip-hop, pop, electronic, and R&B producers want you to feel. This is how music would sound if the artist could play it back for you in person. Put the World on MuteSilence the noise from your daily co...
feature_bullets: Renewed products look and work like new. These pre-owned products have been inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers, which typically perform a full diagnostic test, replacement of any defective parts, and a thorough cleaning process. Packaging and accessories may be generic. All products on Amazon Renewed come with a minimum 90-day supplier-backed warranty.

The New Beats Studio Wireless comes with a built-in rechargeable battery that lasts 12 hours when using wirelessly and 20 hours when you do decide to plug in. With the Battery Fuel Gauge, you always know how much juice is left. Forget specialized adapters; the New Studio can be charged via micro USB almost anywhere
